Package com.amazonaws.http

Class HttpRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.http.HttpRequest
  • public class HttpRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    A HTTP request class. Any AmazonWebServiceRequest will be translated to this class before being sent out by HttpClient.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      HttpRequest​(java.lang.String method, java.net.URI uri)
      Constructs a HttpRequest with given method and uri.
      HttpRequest​(java.lang.String method, java.net.URI uri, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> headers, java.io.InputStream content)
      Constructs a HttpRequest with given method and uri.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.io.InputStream getContent()
      Gets the input stream, null if no content.
      long getContentLength()
      Gets the length of the content which is set in the header, 0 if no content.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> getHeaders()
      Gets an unmodifiable headers map.
      java.lang.String getMethod()
      Gets the HTTP method, one of GET, POST, PUT, HEAD, DELETE.
      java.net.URI getUri()
      Gets the URI of this request.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HttpRequest

        public HttpRequest​(java.lang.String method,
                   java.net.URI uri)
        Constructs a HttpRequest with given method and uri. It uses no header and has no content. It's handy for HEAD/GET/DELETE where content is absent.
        Parameters:
        method - HTTP method
        uri - uri of the request.

      • HttpRequest

        public HttpRequest​(java.lang.String method,
                   java.net.URI uri,
                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> headers,
                   java.io.InputStream content)
        Constructs a HttpRequest with given method and uri.
        Parameters:
        method - HTTP method
        uri - uri of the request.
        headers - HTTP headers key-value map
        content - content of the request. Can be null if no content.

    • Method Detail

      • getMethod

        public java.lang.String getMethod()
        Gets the HTTP method, one of GET, POST, PUT, HEAD, DELETE.
        Returns:
        the HTTP method

      • getUri

        public java.net.URI getUri()
        Gets the URI of this request.
        Returns:
        uri of this request

      • getHeaders

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> getHeaders()
        Gets an unmodifiable headers map. Possible headers are: user-agent, date, content-length, x-amz-.
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable headers map

      • getContent

        public java.io.InputStream getContent()
        Gets the input stream, null if no content.
        Returns:
        the input stream, null if no content.

      • getContentLength

        public long getContentLength()
        Gets the length of the content which is set in the header, 0 if no content.
        Returns:
        the length of the content, 0 if no content

        public boolean isStreaming()
